name: Protecting the Base
description:
This is a tower defense game, where you can experience the charm of war from the game summary, reasonably prevent turrets, upgrade your turrets, and win victory.

Easy to play tower defense games and make rational use of resources.

The enemy will advance along a fixed route, and you need to build forts on both sides of the road to eliminate them.

If you fail to eliminate them, the enemy will reach the finish line and the game will fail!

Total utilization of fixed funds, suitable for setting up artillery stations!



Your task is to defeat fast-moving enemies, and the simple visual style is easy to master

Quickly moving enemies make your challenges enjoyable;

Providing a comfortable experience, killing enemies has a very rich reward.
